DOC.criteria: Patients type 2 diabetes mellitus ( accord World Health Organization criterion ) attend Endocrine Division ’ outpatient clinic Hospital de Clínicas de Porto Alegre , Brazil . Patients select accord follow criterion : age < 75 year , A1c < 10 % , 24hour UAER 20 mcg/min 199 mcg/min confirm least twice 6month period , serum triglyceride < 400 mg/dl normal liver thyroid function test . Patients exclude study BMI > 34 kg/m2 , serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dl , repeat episode urinary tract infection , renal disease , symptomatic autonomic neuropathy , heart failure , acute myocardial infarction , coronary artery revascularization procedure stroke within last 6 month .
